TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Utf8Formatter extends System.Object
public ref class Utf8Formatter abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于将常见数据类型的格式设置为 Utf8 字符串的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static mthods to format common data types as Utf8 strings.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryFormat (bool value, Span<byte> destination, out int bytesWritten, System.Buffers.StandardFormat format = null);
.method public static hidebysig bool TryFormat(bool value, valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> destination, [out] int32& bytesWritten, valuetype System.Buffers.StandardFormat format) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryFormat (value As Boolean, destination As Span(Of Byte), ByRef bytesWritten As Integer, Optional format As StandardFormat = null) As Boolean
static member TryFormat : bool * Span<byte> * * System.Buffers.StandardFormat -> bool

param.name: value
param.span: 要格式化的值。

span.span: The value to format.

param.name: destination
param.span: 要写入 UTF8 格式的值的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer to write the UTF8-formatted value to.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 方法返回时，包含格式化文本的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: When the method returns, contains the length of the formatted text in bytes.

param.name: format
param.span: 要使用的标准格式。

span.span: The standard format to use.

summary.span: 将 的格式设置为 UTF8 字符串。

span.span: Formats a as a UTF8 string.

returns.span: 如果格式设置操作成功，则为 ；如果 太小，则为 。

span.span: if the formatting operation succeeds; if is too small.

remarks.format: 支持的格式：Formats supported: |格式字符串Format string|示例结果字符串Example result string| |--|--| |G （默认值）G (default)|True/FalseTrue/False| |ll|true/falsetrue/false| 如果该方法失败，则迭代增加缓冲区的大小并重试，直到成功为止。If the method fails, iteratively increase the size of the buffer and retry until it succeeds.

remarks.format: 支持的格式：Formats supported: |格式字符串Format string|结果字符串Result string|注释Comments| |--|--|--| |c/t/T （默认值）c/t/T (default)|[-][d.]hh： mm： ss [. fffffff][-][d.]hh:mm:ss[.fffffff]|（常量格式）(constant format)| |GG|[-] d:hh： mm： ss. fffffff[-]d:hh:mm:ss.fffffff||（常规长）(general long)| |gg|[-][d：][h] h:mm： ss [. f [f [f [f [f [f [f]]]]]][-][d:][h]h:mm:ss[.f[f[f[f[f[f[f]]]]]]|（一般简称）(general short)| 如果该方法失败，则迭代增加缓冲区的大小并重试，直到成功为止。If the method fails, iteratively increase the size of the buffer and retry until it succeeds.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool TryFormat (ushort value, Span<byte> destination, out int bytesWritten, System.Buffers.StandardFormat format = null);

.method public static hidebysig bool TryFormat(unsigned int16 value, valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> destination, [out] int32& bytesWritten, valuetype System.Buffers.StandardFormat format) cil managed
Public Shared Function TryFormat (value As UShort, destination As Span(Of Byte), ByRef bytesWritten As Integer, Optional format As StandardFormat = null) As Boolean
static member TryFormat : uint16 * Span<byte> * * System.Buffers.StandardFormat -> bool

param.name: value
param.span: 要格式化的值。

span.span: The value to format.

param.name: destination
param.span: 要写入 UTF8 格式的值的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer to write the UTF8-formatted value to.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 方法返回时，包含格式化文本的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: When the method returns, contains the length of the formatted text in bytes.

param.name: format
param.span: 要使用的标准格式。

span.span: The standard format to use.

summary.span: 将 的格式设置为 UTF8 字符串。

span.span: Formats a as a UTF8 string.

returns.span: 如果格式设置操作成功，则为 ；如果 太小，则为 。

span.span: if the formatting operation succeeds; if is too small.

remarks.format: 支持的格式：Formats supported: |格式字符串Format string|示例结果字符串Example result string| |--|--| |G/g （默认值）G/g (default)| | |D/dD/d|3276732767| |N/nN/n|32,76732,767| |X/xX/x|7fff7fff| 如果该方法失败，则迭代增加缓冲区的大小并重试，直到成功为止。If the method fails, iteratively increase the size of the buffer and retry until it succeeds.
